mapper.sql: m_id, m_name, m_score, m_pwd, m_email, m_date, m_signtimes, m_level
mapper.insert: insert into master (m_id, m_name, m_score, m_pwd, m_email, m_date, m_signtimes, m_level) values (#{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mSigntimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER})

m_id,
m_name,

mapper.update:
update master
m_name = #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_score = #{mScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m_pwd = #{mPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_email = #{mEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
m_date = #{mDate,jdbcType=DATE},
m_signtimes = #{mSigntimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m_level = #{mLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
